transportAdvice: Nara's main tourist areas, including Nara Park and the historic temples, are highly walkable and compact enough to explore on foot; local buses connect key sights for those venturing further afield, and taxis are readily available throughout the city.

weather.description: Cold and dry winter days with occasional frost, requiring warm layers but generally clear skies.
Still cold but early signs of late-winter warming, with crisp air and occasional light rain.
Early spring brings mild temperatures and the start of cherry blossom season toward month's end.
Pleasant spring weather with cherry blossoms in full bloom and comfortable sightseeing conditions.
Warm and largely sunny, one of the most enjoyable months to visit before summer heat arrives.
The rainy season brings frequent showers and rising humidity, making outdoor exploration less comfortable.
Hot and very humid with heavy rainfall, particularly in the first half of the month during the tail of the rainy season.
The hottest month of the year with intense heat and high humidity; early morning visits to outdoor sites are advisable.
Typhoon season brings the risk of heavy rain and strong winds, though heat begins to ease toward month's end.
Comfortable autumn temperatures and beautiful fall foliage make this one of the best months to visit.
Cool and crisp with stunning autumn colors across the temples and parks, ideal for sightseeing.
Cold and quiet with low crowds, offering a peaceful atmosphere around the historic sites in winter light.
